name: Figma Trigger (Beta)
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Figma events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Figma Trigger (Beta) 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Figma events occur

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Trigger will monitor this Figma Team for changes. Team ID can be found in the URL of a Figma Team page when viewed in a web browser: figma.com/files/team/{TEAM-ID}/.
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team ID | 作用: Trigger will monitor this Figma Team for changes. Team ID can be found in the URL of a Figma Team page when viewed in a web browser: figma.com/files/team/{TEAM-ID}/. | (必填项)

triggerOn.name: triggerOn
triggerOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | (必填项)
available_options: File Commented (值: fileComment) - Triggers when someone comments on a file
File Deleted (值: fileDelete) - Triggers whenever a file has been deleted. Does not trigger on all files within a folder, if the folder is deleted.
File Updated (值: fileUpdate) - Triggers whenever a file saves or is deleted. This occurs whenever a file is closed or within 30 seconds after changes have been made.
File Version Updated (值: fileVersionUpdate) - Triggers whenever a named version is created in the version history of a file
Library Publish (值: libraryPublish) - Triggers whenever a library file is published
